description: Lists active Gremlin queries. See Gremlin query status API for details about the output. When invoking this operation in a Neptune cluster that has IAM authentication enabled, the IAM user or role making the request must have a policy attached that allows the neptune-db:GetQueryStatus IAM action in that cluster. Note that the neptune-db:QueryLanguage:Gremlin IAM condition key can be used in the policy document to restrict the use of Gremlin queries (see Condition keys available in Neptune IAM data-access policy statements).

nested_items.name: acceptedQueryCount
nested_items.description: The number of queries that have been accepted but not yet completed, including queries in the queue.

nested_items.name: runningQueryCount
nested_items.description: The number of Gremlin queries currently running.

nested_items.name: queries
nested_items.description: A list of the current queries.

nested_items.name: queryId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Gremlin query.

nested_items.name: queryString
nested_items.description: The query string of the Gremlin query.

nested_items.name: queryEvalStats
nested_items.description: The query statistics of the Gremlin query.

nested_items.name: waited
nested_items.description: Indicates how long the query waited, in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: elapsed
nested_items.description: The number of milliseconds the query has been running so far.

nested_items.name: cancelled
nested_items.description: Set to TRUE if the query was cancelled, or FALSE otherwise.

nested_items.name: subqueries
nested_items.description: The number of subqueries in this query.
